name: Ashma
description:
This is an early prototype for a game which intends to introduce concepts of triangular geometry to the player. The target demographic is class 9, CBSE students in India. The game was made using the Unity Engine. The Web Player build is uploaded here and it can be run on all browsers except Google Chrome.

The game was designed and developed as part of my Design Project - 1 module of the 2 year M.Des in Toy and Game Design programme at the National Institute of Design, Gandhinagar.
